channel.title: 508 client with full pvp armour!
channel.description:
Hi, this is my 508 client that I am giving you. I just added All pvp armour, All spirit shields, fally achievement diary shields, dharoks axe, and a lot more! Here is a picture of all of them in my inventory. The helms are tiny, but they work. Yes I see that I had a lot of people on my server asking for stuff, and one in the background dieing.. [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/vub86.jpg[/img]
Here is the Download link http://www.mediafire.com/?2k1rtinyw3z Now to change what ip it connects to other than mine, go to client.java, and search for kiddscape.servebeer.com and change it to yours, hit the build button that is next to run, and your finished! I hope you like my client, I added a lot of things to it and it took me a while. It is client for the armour, it does not come with the source.
~ kiddryan7

item.title: 508 client with full pvp armour!
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“kiddryan77, post:9, topic:326939”]Yes, with pvp…You don’t know anything about a client then…What This does is if you use it on ANY SOURCE! The items I made it replace will be the pvp items. Every pvp item is on that client and works. So lewis get over it you lost! I replaced I believe some addy armour, and bronze. If you dont believe me then download it and use it, all of the codes are in applet sub1 and it should say case 1169:
class19.anInt330 = 16219;//inventory/drop model
class19.anInt336 = 1500 ;//model zoom
class19.anInt389 = 400;//modelRotation1
class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2
class19.anInt358 = 0;// model offset 1
class19.anInt391 = 0;// model offset 2
class19.anInt390 = 16220;//Male model id
class19.anInt387 = 16220;//female model id
class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, “C.Morrigan’s coif”);//Item Name
break;

Case 1169 is the item code, so go on and try it.[/quote]

But the fact still states - it’s not pvp.

If you know what pvp ment (player verses player) maybe then you would understand, it’s armour not pvp and really statius etc isnt pvp armour anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 client with full pvp armour!
item.dc:creator: @kiddryan77 kiddryan77
item.description:
@kiddryan77 wrote:

Yes, with pvp…You don’t know anything about a client then…What This does is if you use it on ANY SOURCE! The items I made it replace will be the pvp items. Every pvp item is on that client and works. So lewis get over it you lost! I replaced I believe some addy armour, and bronze. If you dont believe me then download it and use it, all of the codes are in applet sub1 and it should say case 1169:
class19.anInt330 = 16219;//inventory/drop model
class19.anInt336 = 1500 ;//model zoom
class19.anInt389 = 400;//modelRotation1
class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2
class19.anInt358 = 0;// model offset 1
class19.anInt391 = 0;// model offset 2
class19.anInt390 = 16220;//Male model id
class19.anInt387 = 16220;//female model id
class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, “C.Morrigan’s coif”);//Item Name
break;

Case 1169 is the item code, so go on and try it.

Read full topic
